page.title: 17HAVING FUN IN STRATHNAIRN
page.content: {SWIMMING Swimming is a good sport.I quite like swimming there are lots of places you can swim in our area like the river or a loch.It is pretty dangerous to swim in lochs around here because the water is cold and there are strong currents. I can swim without armbands or a ring. I can only do two strokes,the breast stroke and the front crawl. {HORSE RIDING I have never been out riding but I have always wanted to very much.I see lots of people riding in this area of ours.A few people keep horses but it is very expensive. {CYCLING There are lots of people cycling in our area like us biking to school.I often like going on a cycling run. It is real fun going down hills but I dont like going up hills.
